title: Puffed Caramel Corn
directions: Preheat oven to 250 degrees F (120 degrees C).

Combine butter, brown sugar, and karo syrup. Boil for 2 to 3 minutes. Add vanilla and baking soda. Pour over puffed corn. Bake in oven for 45 minutes, stirring every 15 minutes. Break apart and transfer to an airtight container.
